additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Technique, Internet, Telephone, Cable-TV, Alarm System, Generator, Heating system: gas, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 There is also a Kitchen/Dining 35m²  has Italian Furniture with household appliances, Cloakroom 6, Laundry room 17m², Baisement 54m², boiler room 6m², Electric system’s room 5m², Greenhouse 16m², Wine Cellar 30m² with 2 traditional Georgian Wine china barrels. House is insulated with 60mm Danish thermo insulation called “Rockwool”. Additional areas which are not included in general area are: additional Basement 80m². House has security system as well as the perimeter of the yard has surveillance cameras and perimeter motion detection sensors. Also Gates and Garage door are on remote control. Yard includes: sprinkling system, 50 fruit and 60 evergreen trees, a well and 8m² kennel.
